S0133: Llegas a conocer | conocer muy bien a alguien | muy bien a alguien | a alguien | muy bien | cuando trabajan juntos | trabajan juntos
You get to to know | to to know someone very well | someone very well | someone | very well | when you work together | work together
S0134: No es un problema | No es | un problema | cuando trabajas | trabajas en algo difícil | en algo difícil | algo difícil | con ellos
It's not a problem | It's not | a problem | when you work | work at something difficult | at something difficult | something difficult | with them
S0135: No sé | No sé por qué | por qué | por qué piensas | piensas | piensas que es tan bueno | que es tan bueno | es tan bueno | tan bueno
I don't to know | I don't to know why | why | why you think | you think | think that it's so good | that it's so good | it's so good | so good
S0136: Por supuesto | Por supuesto que puedes | que puedes preguntarle | puedes preguntarle | puedes | preguntarle | porque es mi amiga | es mi amiga
Of course | Of course you to can | that you to can to ask her | you to can to ask her | you to can | to ask her | because she's my friend | she's my friend
S0137: Es más importante | más importante hablar frecuentemente | hablar frecuentemente | hablar | frecuentemente | que ser perfecto | ser perfecto
It's more important | more important to to talk often | to to talk often | to to talk | often | than to to be perfect | to to be perfect
